pwalk(
  .l = appshots_parameters, 
  .f = function(app_name, vwidth, vheight, selector, cliprect) {
  if (
    file.mtime(here("images", paste0(app_name, ".png"))) < 
    max(ref, file.mtime(here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name))))
  ) {
    if (!is.na(selector)) {
      return(
        appshot(
          app = here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name)), 
          delay = 2,
          vwidth = vwidth,
          # vheight = vheight,
          selector = selector,
          # cliprect = cliprect,
          envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
          file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
        )
      )
    }
    if (!is.na(cliprect)) {
      return(
        appshot(
          app = here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name)), 
          delay = 2,
          vwidth = vwidth,
          vheight = vheight,
          # selector = selector,
          cliprect = cliprect,
          envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
          file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
        )
      )
    }
    appshot(
      app = here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name)), 
      delay = 2,
      vwidth = vwidth,
      vheight = vheight,
      # selector = selector,
      # cliprect = cliprect,
      envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
      file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
    )
  }
})
